summary.span: 定義值來指定要如何調整資料行的寬度。

span.span: Defines values for specifying how the width of a column is adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以調整大小，讓它們填滿可用的水平寬度的控制項，或使其顯示的完整內容或指定的儲存格的所有資料格及其資料行。The control can resize its columns to make them fill the available horizontal width of the control or to make them display the full contents of all cells or of specified cells. 填滿模式資料行的慣用的寬度取決於調整模式的所有資料行，因此在控制項中的所有可見資料行完全填滿可用顯示區域的水平寬度。With Fill mode, the preferred width of a column is determined by resizing all columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 與其他模式，慣用的資料行寬度會是該資料行，例如目前顯示的資料列中的資料格子集中顯示來自所有儲存格或子集的資料格最大資料格的值所需的最小寬度。With other modes, the preferred column width is the minimum width required to display the largest cell value from all cells or a subset of cells in that column, such as the subset of cells that are in currently displayed rows. 用於避免對效能帶來負面影響，處理多個資料列的資料時使用資料格的子集來判斷新的寬度。Using a subset of cells to determine the new width is useful to avoid a performance penalty when working with many rows of data. 以內容為基礎的自動調整大小，可防止使用者調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。Content-based automatic resizing prevents users from adjusting column widths with the mouse. 使用者重新調整大小會啟用在填滿模式中，不過。User resizing is enabled in fill mode, however. 這個列舉型別由和資料行的屬性和方法。This enumeration is used by the and properties of columns and the method. 如需調整大小模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about sizing modes, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關資料行填入模式特別的是，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode in particular, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個列舉來設定固定寬度資料行。The following code example illustrates the use of this enumeration to configure a fixed-width column. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 設定 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的調整大小模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Set the Sizing Modes of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
